title: report: i cant install league?
body: league stopped working for me so i was going to uninstall and reinstall and it wont even let me down it anymore. it keeps telling me that it cant connect to the http server and to check my internet connection or make sure my firewall wasnt blocking it. it was running fine and the next minute it wouldnt open for me anymore, i cant imagine why my firewall would be blocking it but i know my internet is working fine, so i just dont know why it wont work for me anymore. :'(

replies.body: Your issue might be due to your network having trouble establishing a connection to the servers.  I recommend going through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get this resolved.  As an additional tool, you can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to automatically configure your firewall settings to allow access.  I hope that helps, but let me know!

it ended up downloading when i reformatted my computer and used a different microsoft account but when i was playing a ranked game one time i disconnected so i closed it and tried to reconnect and it said i was disconnected from the chat. Then I restarted league all over again and it wouldnt let me open like it did for the original reason i had to reinstall. it went away during that game but i still lost ip like i was afk.
Are you having trouble installing the game or downloading the installer for the game?
its working now for some reason but before it was the installer for the game i think.
